[Scotto] A qualifying offer was tendered to Svi Mykhailiuk by Oklahoma, per a league source. Mykhailiuk will be a restricted free agent once free agency starts this week.
[Scotto] The Oklahoma City Thunder have rescinded the qualifying offer on Svi Mykhailiuk, league sources told Hoops Hype. Mykhailiuk is now an unrestricted free agent on the market.
